original_title: Playing In The FM Band: The Steve Post Story
overview: Steve Post was an overweight, shy, Jewish kid born in the Bronx who had a complicated childhood. Eventually, he realized his dream at WBAI, became a cult radio personality who innovated in "free form" radio, and helped many other youthful aspirants find their voices and realize their radio dreams.
title: Playing In The FM Band: The Steve Post Story
